name: The Flag Project 2021

meta.title: Contact Us | The Flag Project 2021 Submissions | Rockefeller Center
meta.description: Artists of all ages and skill levels can submit New York City-inspired photos for display on the Rockefeller Center Plaza. Send a design today to see it on a flag.

text: We want your submission to be eligible. Please make sure your photo meets the sizing specs found here.

thankYouMessage.title: Thank you so much for your submission to The Flag Project!
thankYouMessage.caption: We will be announcing the winning selections shortly after the contest closes on February 26. Stay tuned to see if your photo has been selected! Sign up for The Center Newsletter and follow us on socials @RockefellerCenter for more updates on the project and news from Rockefeller Center. Thank you again for your participation.

formSubmissionNotice: In your consideration of my submission for this project, I hereby grant to RCPI Landmark Properties, L.L.C (Rockefeller Center) permission to photograph, reproduce, and use new and original Artwork/Photography that I have submitted for The Flag Project at Rockefeller Center, 2021 in digital and print format. I grant RCPI Landmark Properties, L.L.C permission for non-exclusive rights to use the work(s), image(s), art object(s) including any photograph(s) or audio-visual recording(s) of me to the extent included in any of these materials, in perpetuity, not limited to communication, promotional, commercial, or archival use, without compensation, in this and future editions of The Flag Project.

I understand that submission of Artwork/Photography does not guarantee display. I certify that no other individual or parties hold copyright interest in the Artwork/Photography, that I hold all rights to the works listed, and that the license granted herein does not violate any third-party rights or applicable laws. I certify that the subject matter and content of the Artwork/Photography will not cause damage or reputable harm to RCPI Landmark Properties L.L.C. and grant RCPI Landmark Properties, L.L.C the right to remove Artwork/Photography at any time for any reason.

I hereby certify and covenant that I am over 18 and of legal age (a parent or legal guardian must sign for a minor), or if applicable, that I am authorized to sign on behalf of the entity listed below.
